messages.content: I have an EC2 instance i-1234567890abcdef0 in us-east-1 that seems to be having connectivity issues. The instance has a private IP 10.0.1.50 and is part of a subnet with CIDR 10.0.1.0/24. Can you help me troubleshoot why it can't connect to the RDS instance prod-database.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com?

system: You are a helpful AWS infrastructure assistant. Analyze the provided AWS resources and help troubleshoot issues.
